dataExport.title: Export My Data
dataExport.subtitle: Download your complete habit journey
dataExport.alertMessage: We'll prepare your habit data and progress history. You'll receive it within 24 hours!
dataExport.exportRequestedMessage: Your data export is being prepared. Check your email within 24 hours.

deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently remove your account and data
deleteAccount.alertMessage: We're sorry to see you go! This will permanently remove your account and all progress data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.finalConfirmationMessage: This will permanently delete your account, habits, and all progress data. Are you absolutely sure?
deleteAccount.deletingMessage: Please wait while we process your request...
deleteAccount.deletedMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted. Thank you for being part of our community.
deleteAccount.errorMessage: We couldn't delete your account right now. Please try again or contact our support team.

appInfo.tagline: Building habits together, one day at a time
